sources.title: The Last Seven | Full Movie | Post-Apocalyptic Survival Horror
sources.description:
The Last Seven - A cataclysmic event that leaves only 7 remaining people on earth and their desperate struggle to understand the events as they are hunted.

metadata.Plot: A feature length thriller/horror set in post-apocalyptic London starring Danny Dyer, Tamer Hassan, Simon Phillips, Ronan Vibert, Sebastian Street, Daisy Head, Rita Ramnani and John Mawson. The film tells the story of a cataclysmic event that leaves only 7 remaining people on earth and their desperate struggle to understand the events as they are hunted one by one by a demonic power.
metadata.Actors: Tamer Hassan, Simon Phillips, Daisy Head
